solution_line_template: There are {orchestra_students} x {multiplier_for_band} = <<{orchestra_students}*{multiplier_for_band}={band_students}>>{band_students} students in the band.
There are {boys_in_choir} + {girls_in_choir} = <<{boys_in_choir}+{girls_in_choir}={choir_students}>>{choir_students} students in the choir.
